overview:
Dr Darrin M Disley is responsible for corporate development, general operations and investor relations for Horizon Discovery.

Darrin is a serial business entrepreneur and has been involved in the start-up and growth of seven high-tech business ventures. He is an experienced general manager with a track-record for raising investment for and managing the growth of early-stage technology companies.

Darrin holds a PhD in Biotechnology from the University of Cambridge; has been the author of six papers, 7 patent applications and 26 conference abstracts and; has been an advisor on biotech commercialisation strategies to key technology centres in Europe, USA, India and Africa.
